95917046085.long_description: Go paperless with AT&T Online FaxSM. Send and receive faxes using your mobile device, laptop, or work computer-from virtually anywhere with an Internet connection. Faxes are delivered directly to your Online Fax Inbox, where you can manage your faxes the way you manage your email. There is no need for a physical fax machine or to download, install, and maintain software. AT&T Online Fax lets you easily track sent and received faxes, view monthly usage, and download faxes in PDF or TIFF format. You can archive for up to one year any faxes that you have sent and received.

rewards.description: Get $100 Off Router after rebate with qualifying AT&T internet service purchase.
rewards.redeemRewardDetails:
AT&T Rewards
Watch your mailbox! Within 4 weeks of your service installation, you'll receive a letter in the mail notifying you that your AT&T reward is ready to be claimed along with the redemption instructions. Reward invitations expire! Claim your reward by the "claim by" date clearly printed on the letter. To be eligible for your reward, you must maintain active, qualifying service(s) for a minimum of 30 days from your installation/activation date and be active at time of Reward fulfillment (or other qualifying time frame if any.)
At the Reward Center you will be presented with a personal AT&T Reward TrackerTM for each available reward. The Reward Tracker will clearly identify each step in the reward process including when your reward mails!
rewards.long_description:
Offer for rebate on AT&T provided Modem or Router with online purchase of new FastAccess� Business DSL or FastAccess� Business DSL Direct and 12-month commitment:
For online purchases of FastAccess� Business DSL or FastAccess� Business DSL Direct only, AT&T will provide either a $100.00 rebate credit for an AT&T provided router or a $75.00 rebate credit for an AT&T provided modem subject to the following terms and conditions:
Available with 12 month term commitment to FastAccess� Business DSL or FastAccess� Business DSL Direct. One equipment rebate allowed per FastAccess Business DSL or FastAccess Business DSL Direct line. Customer�s account must be current and in service for a minimum of 60 calendar days to be eligible for rebate. Information about the AT&T Business Reward Center and online rebate redemption will be sent by mail. AT&T will apply a credit with the purchase of an AT&T modem or router on the customer's AT&T phone bill following completion of the online rebate redemption process. Credits will be applied within two billing cycles following completion of such redemption process. Applicable taxes and fees are based on the full price of all products and services, and no taxes, fees or shipping and handling charges will be added to any reward or rebate. Customers must complete the online rebate redemption process within 90 calendar days of AT&T FastAccess Business DSL or FastAccess Business DSL Direct service activation. The equipment rebate offer is valid in the following states: AL, FL, GA, KY, LA, MS, NC, SC & TN. Rebate void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Rebate may not be assigned, transferred or sold. Rebate cannot exceed total purchase price of the AT&T modem or router. Some customers may need to purchase additional equipment (for example: Ethernet card and/or cable). AT&T may provide refurbished modem or router.
rewards.display_name: Router included after rebate - FastAccess DSL

95816052762.description: Capable of receiving high-definition content. Digital video recorder can record up to 4 programs at a time.
95816052762.long_description:
About Our Receivers:  
      
     Most packages include one wired Total Home DVR     
     All of our receivers can control the Total Home DVR including pausing live TV, recording, playing, rewinding, and fast forwarding     
     All of our receivers are HD ready with 100% digital audio and video     
  
  
Total Home DVR Receiver (Wired) 
Record up to 4 shows at once on a single DVR and play back shows from any room in the house. You can even schedule recordings remotely with a compatible smartphone or tablet.  
Wired Receiver (Non-DVR) 
Like all of our receivers, our standard wired receiver streams live HD and standard definition programming, and provides access to U-verse Movies, Pay Per View, applications, Multiview, Channel Guide, Total Home DVR� Menu, and other features.  
Wireless Receiver (Non-DVR) 
No TV outlet? No problem. Now you have the freedom to place your TV where you want, regardless of where existing TV outlets are located. Watch cooking shows in the kitchen, or movies by the pool. Tailgate with your favorite team on the patio. Watch virtually anywhere in your home.

Whether you're a gamer or a business owner, it's perfect for you, supporting multiple-users, high-resolution graphics, large attachment uploads, desktop video, and even hosting a website! No matter where you want to go with your Internet connection, Internet Basic 6 will get you there faster. In addition, you'll also enjoy: online photo and video storage, up to 10 additional email accounts, pop-up blocker, and much more from AT&T.

95816052433.description: I have an HD-ready TV and want to add HDTV service - HD Technology Fee for
95816052433.long_description:
High-definition television (HDTV) is the highest of all broadcasting standards for digital TV. HDTV signals "paint" a picture on your TV with higher resolution, or more picture information, than standard broadcast signals use. Your HD-capable television (also known as an "HDTV") can display both standard definition and HDTV images, but it needs HD signals to look its best. 
 
 AT&T U-verse offers:
      
     Access to over 225 HD channels and growing, including your favorite sports, events, and movies.*     
     HD-ready receivers, included in every U-verse package     
   
 
 *Access to HD programming requires $10 monthly HD Technology Fee. HD Premium Tier available for an additional $7 per month and requires subscription to HD service for $10 per month.

95816052436.long_description: Your total internet usage allowance can consist of your 1 terabyte plan usage allowance plus any additional offers. Exceeding your total internet usage allowance will result in a charge of $10 for each additional 50 gigabytes of data even if less than 50 gigabytes is consumed. Visit www.att.com/internet-usage to view details of your internet data usage.

95816049772.description: Everything in DIRECTV Protection Plan plus protection for all your favorite entertainment devices.
95816049772.long_description: Get all the DIRECTV� Protection Plan benefits      Plus, cover all your favorite entertainment devices, including eligible flat screen TVs, computers, and tablets.   The initial term is 6 months, and then continues on a month-to-month basis. You can cancel at anytime, including within the initial 6 months, with no Early Termination Fee.  $50 deductible when you file claims on TVs, computers, laptops, tablets, home theater systems and monitors/ $2,000-per-claim limit / $6,000 annual limit.  Limitations and exclusions apply. See terms and conditions for complete details. Receiver upgrade offer: Qualified customers enrolled in a DIRECTV Protection Plan for greater than 12 consecutive months may upgrade their DIRECTV receiver every 2 years from initial date of installation or from the date of any prior receiver upgrade. Residential customers only. Subject to Equipment Lease Agreement. 24-month agreement required, or 12-month agreement required if equipment is shipped to customer without professional installation. Early Termination Fee of $10 for each month remaining on agreement, equipment non-return & additional fees apply. Must maintain a minimum base TV package of $29.99a month.

95816055008.description: Everything in DIRECTV Protection Plan plus protection for all your favorite entertainment devices.
95816055008.long_description: Get all the DIRECTV� Protection Plan benefits  Plus, cover all your favorite entertainment devices, including eligible flat screen TVs, computers, and tablets.  The initial term is 6 months, and then continues on a month-to-month basis. You can cancel at anytime, including within the initial 6 months, with no Early Termination Fee.   $50 deductible when you file claims on TVs, computers, laptops, tablets, home theater systems and monitors/ $2,000-per-claim limit / $6,000 annual limit.   Limitations and exclusions apply. See terms and conditions for complete details. Receiver upgrade offer: Qualified customers enrolled in a DIRECTV Protection Plan for greater than 12 consecutive months may upgrade their DIRECTV receiver every 2 years from initial date of installation or from the date of any prior receiver upgrade. Residential customers only. Subject to Equipment Lease Agreement. 24-month agreement required, or 12-month agreement required if equipment is shipped to customer without professional installation. Early Termination Fee of $10 for each month remaining on agreement, equipment non-return & additional fees apply. Must maintain a minimum base TV package of $29.99a month.

95816056017.long_description:
About Our Receivers:





Most packages include one wired Total Home DVR


All of our receivers can control the Total Home DVR including pausing live TV, recording, playing, rewinding, and fast forwarding


All of our receivers are HD ready with 100% digital audio and video






Total Home DVR Receiver (Wired)

Record up to 4 shows at once on a single DVR and play back shows from any room in the house. You can even schedule recordings remotely with a compatible smartphone or tablet.


Wired Receiver (Non-DVR)

Like all of our receivers, our standard wired receiver streams live HD and standard definition programming, and provides access to U-verse Movies, Pay Per View, applications, Multiview, Channel Guide, Total Home DVR� Menu, and other features.


Wireless Receiver (Non-DVR)

No TV outlet? No problem. Now you have the freedom to place your TV where you want, regardless of where existing TV outlets are located. Watch cooking shows in the kitchen, or movies by the pool. Tailgate with your favorite team on the patio. Watch virtually anywhere in your home.

95816056016.description: I have an HD-ready TV and want to add HDTV service - HD Technology Fee for
95816056016.long_description:
High-definition television (HDTV) is the highest of all broadcasting standards for digital TV. HDTV signals "paint" a picture on your TV with higher resolution, or more picture information, than standard broadcast signals use. Your HD-capable television (also known as an "HDTV") can display both standard definition and HDTV images, but it needs HD signals to look its best.

 

 AT&T U-verse offers:



Access to over 225 HD channels and growing, including your favorite sports, events, and movies.*


HD-ready receivers, included in every U-verse package



 

 *Access to HD programming requires $10 monthly HD Technology Fee. HD Premium Tier available for an additional $7 per month and requires subscription to HD service for $10 per month.

rewards.description: Get $100 Off Router after rebate with qualifying AT&T internet service purchase.
rewards.redeemRewardDetails:
AT&T Rewards
Watch your mailbox! Within 4 weeks of your service installation, you'll receive a letter in the mail notifying you that your AT&T reward is ready to be claimed along with the redemption instructions. Reward invitations expire! Claim your reward by the "claim by" date clearly printed on the letter. To be eligible for your reward, you must maintain active, qualifying service(s) for a minimum of 30 days from your installation/activation date and be active at time of Reward fulfillment (or other qualifying time frame if any.)
At the Reward Center you will be presented with a personal AT&T Reward TrackerTM for each available reward. The Reward Tracker will clearly identify each step in the reward process including when your reward mails!
rewards.long_description:
Offer for rebate on AT&T provided Modem or Router with online purchase of new FastAccess® Business DSL or FastAccess® Business DSL Direct and 12-month commitment:
For online purchases of FastAccess® Business DSL or FastAccess® Business DSL Direct only, AT&T will provide either a $100.00 rebate credit for an AT&T provided router or a $75.00 rebate credit for an AT&T provided modem subject to the following terms and conditions:
Available with 12 month term commitment to FastAccess® Business DSL or FastAccess® Business DSL Direct. One equipment rebate allowed per FastAccess Business DSL or FastAccess Business DSL Direct line. Customer’s account must be current and in service for a minimum of 60 calendar days to be eligible for rebate. Information about the AT&T Business Reward Center and online rebate redemption will be sent by mail. AT&T will apply a credit with the purchase of an AT&T modem or router on the customer's AT&T phone bill following completion of the online rebate redemption process. Credits will be applied within two billing cycles following completion of such redemption process. Applicable taxes and fees are based on the full price of all products and services, and no taxes, fees or shipping and handling charges will be added to any reward or rebate. Customers must complete the online rebate redemption process within 90 calendar days of AT&T FastAccess Business DSL or FastAccess Business DSL Direct service activation. The equipment rebate offer is valid in the following states: AL, FL, GA, KY, LA, MS, NC, SC & TN. Rebate void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Rebate may not be assigned, transferred or sold. Rebate cannot exceed total purchase price of the AT&T modem or router. Some customers may need to purchase additional equipment (for example: Ethernet card and/or cable). AT&T may provide refurbished modem or router.
rewards.display_name: Router included after rebate - FastAccess DSL

rewards.description: Get $87.05 Off Router after rebate with qualifying AT&T internet service online purchase
rewards.long_description:
Offer for rebate on AT&T provided Modem or Router with online purchase of new AT&T High Speed Internet Business Edition or High Speed Internet Direct Business Edition and 12-month commitment: 
For online purchases of AT&T High Speed Internet Business Edition or High Speed Internet Direct Business Edition only, AT&T will provide either a $87.05 rebate credit for an AT&T provided router or a $62.05 rebate credit for an AT&T provided modem subject to the following terms and conditions: 
Available with 12 month term commitment to AT&T High Speed Internet Business Edition or AT&T High Speed Internet Direct Business Edition. One equipment rebate allowed per AT&T High Speed Internet Business Edition or AT&T High Speed Internet Direct Business Edition line. Customer's account must be current and in service for a minimum of 60 calendar days to be eligible for rebate. Information about the AT&T Business Reward Center and online rebate redemption will be sent by mail. Customers must complete the online rebate redemption process within 90 calendar days of AT&T High Speed Internet Business Edition or AT&T High Speed Internet Direct Business Edition Service activation. The equipment rebate offer is valid in the following states: AR, CA, IL, IN, KS, MI, MO, NV, OH, OK, TX, WI. Rebate void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Rebate may not be assigned, transferred or sold. Rebate cannot exceed total purchase price of the AT&T modem or router. Rebate check will be mailed to the customer's billing address within 6 weeks of completion of the online rebate redemption process provided the Customer has met the 60 calendar day minimum service requirement. AT&T is not responsible for late, lost, misdirected, or postage-due mail or mail damaged by the U.S. Post Office. Rebate is offered by AT&T Internet Services and cannot be applied to your AT&T local exchange carrier bill. Some customers may need to purchase additional equipment (for example: Ethernet card and/or cable). AT&T may provide refurbished modem or router.
rewards.display_name: Router included after rebate - High-Speed Internet
